summary.p: This topic explains how Clone Detective integrates into the Visual Studio code editor.

section.title: Clone Marker
section.p: If a clone report is loaded, Clone Detective marks code that is duplicated somewhere else by a purple bar in the margin.
section.note: To customize the color, on the Tools menu, click Options, expand Environment, and click Fonts and Colors. Clone Detective adds two display items, Clone (Margin) and Clone (Background) that you can customize.

section.title: Navigation
section.p: Clone Detective also adds two commands to the code editor's context menu to easily navigate to related source code.

ul.li: Find Clones. Searches for all clones that contain the current line and displays the results in a tool window.
Show Clone Intersections. Shows a list of all files that share code with the file in the code editor.
